verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֗יל <S%H4905><s%> mas-Kil, Maschil לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> le-'A-Saf of Asaph הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nah Give ear עַ֭מִּי <S%H5971><s%> 'Am-mi O my people תּוֹרָתִ֑י <S%H8451><s%> to-ra-Ti; [to] my law הַטּ֥וּ <S%H5186><s%> hat-Tu incline אָ֝זְנְכֶ֗ם <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-ne-Chem, your ears לְאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> le-'im-rei- to the words פִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> Fi. of my mouth

אֶפְתְּחָ֣ה <S%H6605><s%> 'ef-te-Chah I will open בְמָשָׁ֣ל <S%H4912><s%> ve-ma-Shal in a parable פִּ֑י <S%H6310><s%> Pi; my mouth אַבִּ֥יעָה <S%H5042><s%> 'ab-Bi-'ah I will utter חִ֝יד֗וֹת <S%H2420><s%> chi-Dot, dark sayings מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> min-ni- at קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem. of old

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Which שָׁ֭מַעְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> ma'-nu Which we have heard וַנֵּדָעֵ֑ם <S%H3045><s%> van-ne-da-'Em; and known וַ֝אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H1><s%> va-'a-vo-Tei-nu, and our fathers סִפְּרוּ־ <S%H5608><s%> sip-pe-ru- have told לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo We will not נְכַחֵ֨ד׀ <S%H3582><s%> ne-cha-Ched We will not hide מִבְּנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-nei-Hem, [them] from their children לְד֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> le-Dor to the generation אַחֲר֗וֹן <S%H314><s%> a-cha-Ron, to come מְֽ֭סַפְּרִים <S%H5608><s%> Me-sap-pe-rim shewing תְּהִלּ֣וֹת <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-Lot the praises יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וֶעֱזוּז֥וֹ <S%H5807><s%> ve-'e-zu-Zo and his strength וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <S%H6381><s%> ve-nif-le-'o-Tav, and his wonderful works אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah. that he hath done

וַיָּ֤קֶם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kem For he established עֵד֨וּת׀ <S%H5715><s%> 'e-Dut a testimony בְּֽיַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> be-ya-'a-Ko, in Jacob וְתוֹרָה֮ <S%H8451><s%> ve-to-Rah a law שָׂ֤ם <S%H7760><s%> sam and appointed בְּיִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> be-yis-Ra-'El in Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Which צִ֭וָּה <S%H6680><s%> Tziv-vah which he commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲבוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tei-nu; our fathers לְ֝הוֹדִיעָ֗ם <S%H3045><s%> le-ho-di-'Am, that they should make them known לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei-Hem. to their children

לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an might יֵדְע֨וּ׀ <S%H3045><s%> ye-de-'U might know דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> Dor That the generation אַ֭חֲרוֹן <S%H314><s%> 'A-cha-ron to come בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim [them even] the children יִוָּלֵ֑דוּ <S%H3205><s%> yiv-va-Le-du; [which] should be born יָ֝קֻ֗מוּ <S%H6965><s%> ya-Ku-mu, [who] should arise וִֽיסַפְּר֥וּ <S%H5608><s%> vi-sap-pe-Ru and declare לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei-Hem. [them] to their children

וְיָשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> ve-ya-Si-mu That they might set בֵֽאלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Him, in God כִּ֫סְלָ֥ם <S%H3689><s%> kis-Lam their hope וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and not יִ֭שְׁכְּחוּ <S%H7911><s%> Yish-ke-chu and not forget מַֽעַלְלֵי־ <S%H4611><s%> ma-'al-lei- the works אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> 'El; of God וּמִצְוֹתָ֥יו <S%H4687><s%> u-mitz-vo-Tav his commandments יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H5341><s%> yin-Tzo-ru. but keep

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יִהְי֨וּ׀ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu become כַּאֲבוֹתָ֗ם <S%H1><s%> ka-'a-vo-Tam, And might not be as their fathers דּוֹר֮ <S%H1755><s%> dOr generation סוֹרֵ֪ר <S%H5637><s%> so-Rer a stubborn וּמֹ֫רֶ֥ה <S%H4784><s%> u-Mo-Reh and rebellious דּ֭וֹר <S%H1755><s%> Dor a generation לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not הֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> he-Chin aright לִבּ֑וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo; not their heart וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- was not נֶאֶמְנָ֖ה <S%H539><s%> ne-'em-Nah was not stedfast אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> 'el with God רוּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H7307><s%> ru-Cho. and whose spirit

בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- The children אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim נוֹשְׁקֵ֥י <S%H5401><s%> no-she-Kei [being] armed רוֹמֵי־ <S%H7411><s%> ro-mei- [and] carrying קָ֑שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> Ka-shet; bows הָ֝פְכ֗וּ <S%H2015><s%> ha-fe-Chu, turned back בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in the day קְרָֽב׃ <S%H7128><s%> ke-Rav. of battle

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not שָׁ֭מְרוּ <S%H8104><s%> me-ru They kept בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit not the covenant אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; of God וּ֝בְתוֹרָת֗וֹ <S%H8451><s%> u-ve-to-ra-To, in his law מֵאֲנ֥וּ <S%H3985><s%> me-'a-Nu and refused לָלֶֽכֶת׃ <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet. to walk

וַיִּשְׁכְּח֥וּ <S%H7911><s%> vai-yish-ke-Chu And forgat עֲלִילוֹתָ֑יו <S%H5949><s%> a-li-lo-Tav; his works וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <S%H6381><s%> ve-nif-le-'o-Tav, and his wonders אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he הֶרְאָֽם׃ <S%H7200><s%> her-'Am. that he had shewed

נֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged he in the sight אֲ֭בוֹתָם <S%H1><s%> A-vo-tom of their fathers עָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'A-sah did פֶ֑לֶא <S%H6382><s%> Fe-le; Marvellous things בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֣יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt שְׂדֵה־ <S%H7704><s%> se-deh- [in] the field צֹֽעַן׃ <S%H6814><s%> Tzo-'an. of Zoan

בָּ֣קַע <S%H1234><s%> Ba-ka' He divided יָ֭ם <S%H3220><s%> yam the sea וַיַּֽעֲבִירֵ֑ם <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-vi-Rem; and caused them to pass through וַֽיַּצֶּב־ <S%H5324><s%> vai-yatz-tzev- to stand מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim and he made the waters כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> ke-mov- like נֵֽד׃ <S%H5067><s%> Ned. as an heap

וַיַּנְחֵ֣ם <S%H5148><s%> vai-yan-Chem also he led בֶּעָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> be-'a-Nan them with a cloud יוֹמָ֑ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam; In the daytime וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הַ֝לַּ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> hal-Lay-lah, and all the night בְּא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> be-'or with a light אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh. of fire

יְבַקַּ֣ע <S%H1234><s%> ye-vak-Ka' He clave צֻ֭רִים <S%H6697><s%> Tzu-rim the rocks בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness וַ֝יַּ֗שְׁקְ <S%H8248><s%> vai-Yashk, and gave [them] drink כִּתְהֹמ֥וֹת <S%H8415><s%> kit-ho-Mot depths רַבָּֽה׃ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bah. as [out of] the great

וַיּוֹצִ֣א <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-Tzi He brought נוֹזְלִ֣ים <S%H5140><s%> noz-Lim streams מִסָּ֑לַע <S%H5553><s%> mis-Sa-la'; also out of the rock וַיּ֖וֹרֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Yo-red to run down כַּנְּהָר֣וֹת <S%H5104><s%> kan-ne-ha-Rot like rivers מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. and caused waters

וַיּוֹסִ֣יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> vai-yo-Si-fu yet more ע֭וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od still לַחֲטֹא־ <S%H2398><s%> la-cha-to- And they sinned ל֑וֹ lo; לַֽמְר֥וֹת <S%H4784><s%> lam-Rot against him by provoking עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon, the most High בַּצִּיָּֽה׃ <S%H6723><s%> batz-tzi-Yah. in the wilderness

וַיְנַסּוּ־ <S%H5254><s%> vay-nas-su- And they tempted אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> 'el God בִּלְבָבָ֑ם <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-Vam; in their heart לִֽשְׁאָל־ <S%H7592><s%> lish-'ol- by asking אֹ֥כֶל <S%H400><s%> 'O-chel meat לְנַפְשָֽׁם׃ <S%H5315><s%> le-naf-Sham. for their lust

וַֽיְדַבְּר֗וּ <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-be-Ru, Yea they spake בֵּֽאלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> be-Lo-Him against God אָ֭מְרוּ <S%H559><s%> 'A-me-ru they said הֲי֣וּכַל <S%H3201><s%> ha-Yu-chal Can אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> 'El; God לַעֲרֹ֥ךְ <S%H6186><s%> la-'a-Roch furnish שֻׁ֝לְחָ֗ן <S%H7979><s%> le-Chan, a table בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar. desert

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold הִכָּה־ <S%H5221><s%> hik-kah- Behold he smote צ֨וּר׀ <S%H6697><s%> tzur the rock וַיָּז֣וּבוּ <S%H2100><s%> vai-ya-Zu-vu gushed out מַיִם֮ <S%H4325><s%> ma-Yim that the waters וּנְחָלִ֪ים <S%H5158><s%> u-ne-cha-Lim and the streams יִ֫שְׁטֹ֥פוּ <S%H7857><s%> yish-To-fu overflowed הֲגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ha-gam- again לֶ֭חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem bread י֣וּכַל <S%H3201><s%> Yu-chal can תֵּ֑ת <S%H5414><s%> Tet; he give אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo יָכִ֖ין <S%H3559><s%> ya-Chin he provide שְׁאֵ֣ר <S%H7607><s%> she-'Er flesh לְעַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Mo. folk

לָכֵ֤ן׀ <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' heard יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Therefore the LORD וַֽיִּתְעַבָּ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> vai-yit-'ab-Bar [this] and was wroth וְ֭אֵשׁ <S%H784><s%> Ve-'esh so a fire נִשְּׂקָ֣ה <S%H5400><s%> nis-se-Kah was kindled בְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ve-ya-'a-Ko; against Jacob וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- also אַ֝֗ף <S%H639><s%> 'Af, and anger עָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah also came up בְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> ve-Yis-ra-'El. against Israel

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not הֶ֭אֱמִינוּ <S%H539><s%> He-'e-mi-nu Because they believed בֵּאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> be-lo-Him; not in God וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and did not בָ֝טְח֗וּ <S%H982><s%> va-te-Chu, and trusted בִּֽישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3444><s%> bi-shu-'a-to. not in his salvation

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav Though he had commanded שְׁחָקִ֣ים <S%H7834><s%> she-cha-Kim the clouds מִמָּ֑עַל <S%H4605><s%> mi-Ma-'al; from above וְדַלְתֵ֖י <S%H1817><s%> ve-dal-Tei the doors שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim of heaven פָּתָֽח׃ <S%H6605><s%> pa-Tach. and opened

וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר <S%H4305><s%> vai-yam-Ter And had rained down עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem and מָ֣ן <S%H4478><s%> man manna לֶאֱכֹ֑ל <S%H398><s%> le-'e-Chol; upon them to eat וּדְגַן־ <S%H1715><s%> u-de-ga-no-Sha- them of the corn שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> Ma-yim, of heaven נָ֣תַן <S%H5414><s%> Na-tan and had given לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem food אַ֭בִּירִים <S%H47><s%> 'Ab-bi-rim angels' אָ֣כַל <S%H398><s%> 'A-chal did eat אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; Man צֵידָ֬ה <S%H6720><s%> tzei-Dah them meat שָׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach he sent לָהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem in לָשֹֽׂבַע׃ <S%H7648><s%> la-Soa'. to the full

יַסַּ֣ע <S%H5265><s%> yas-Sa' to blow קָ֭דִים <S%H6921><s%> Ka-dim He caused an east wind בַּשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> bash-sha-Ma-yim; in the heaven וַיְנַהֵ֖ג <S%H5090><s%> vay-na-Heg he brought in בְּעֻזּ֣וֹ <S%H5797><s%> be-'uz-Zo and by his power תֵימָֽן׃ <S%H8486><s%> tei-Man. the south wind

וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר <S%H4305><s%> vai-yam-Ter He rained עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem upon כֶּעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> ke-'a-Far also upon them as dust שְׁאֵ֑ר <S%H7607><s%> she-'Er; flesh וּֽכְח֥וֹל <S%H2344><s%> u-che-Chol like as the sand יַ֝מִּ֗ים <S%H3220><s%> yam-Mim, of the sea ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of fowls כָּנָֽף׃ <S%H3671><s%> ka-Naf. and feathered

וַ֭יַּפֵּל <S%H5307><s%> Vai-yap-pel And he let [it] fall בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev in the midst מַחֲנֵ֑הוּ <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Ne-hu; of their camp סָ֝בִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, round about לְמִשְׁכְּנֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4908><s%> le-mish-ke-no-Tav. their habitations

וַיֹּאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> vai-yo-che-Lu So they did eat וַיִּשְׂבְּע֣וּ <S%H7646><s%> vai-yis-be-'U filled מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; and were well וְ֝תַֽאֲוָתָ֗ם <S%H8378><s%> ve-ta-'a-va-Tam, them their own desire יָבִ֥א <S%H935><s%> ya-Vi for he gave לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem. like
